mapper.insert: INSERT INTO machine ( m_type, brand, VERSION, used_time, price, change_price, place_p, place_c, imported, qualified, receipt, production_date, buy_date, code_no, modified, FIXED, old_level, `use`, current_status, description, link_name, phone, qq, create_time, user_id ) VALUES ( #{m_type}, #{brand}, #{version}, #{used_time}, #{price}, #{change_price}, #{place_p}, #{place_c}, #{imported}, #{qualified}, #{receipt}, #{production_date}, #{buy_date}, #{code_no}, #{modified}, #{fixed}, #{old_level}, #{use}, #{current_status}, #{description}, #{link_name}, #{phone}, #{qq}, now(), #{user_id} );

INSERT INTO rent_machine ( m_type, brand, VERSION, used_time, price, change_price, place_p, place_c, imported, qualified, receipt, production_date, buy_date, code_no, modified, FIXED, old_level, description, link_name, phone, qq, create_time, user_id ) VALUES ( #{m_type}, #{brand}, #{version}, #{used_time}, #{price}, #{change_price}, #{place_p}, #{place_c}, #{imported}, #{qualified}, #{receipt}, #{production_date}, #{buy_date}, #{code_no}, #{modified}, #{fixed}, #{old_level}, #{description}, #{link_name}, #{phone}, #{qq}, now(), #{user_id} );

INSERT INTO buy_machine ( m_type, brand, VERSION, price, price2, place_p, place_c, description, link_name, phone, create_time, user_id ) VALUES ( #{m_type}, #{brand}, #{version}, #{price}, #{price2}, #{place_p}, #{place_c}, #{description}, #{link_name}, #{phone}, now(), #{user_id} );

INSERT INTO person ( m_type, salary, place_p, place_c, job, description, link_name, phone, create_time, user_id ) VALUES ( #{m_type}, #{salary}, #{place_p}, #{place_c}, #{job}, #{description}, #{link_name}, #{phone}, now(), #{user_id} );
INSERT INTO `order` ( user_id, co_id, co_point, name, phone, create_time, address ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{co_id}, #{co_point}, #{name}, #{phone}, now(), #{address} );
